name: TEST project (Ner)
description:
5-20 minutes of content, depending on one's reading speed and willingness to find all endings.

This is my first go at trying to make something. As the title implies, it is a test project I did to teach myself how to put together a VN. It is very minimal. This is not a demo for a larger project, although I can see myself returning to this universe in a greater capacity someday when I have the skill to make something more impressive.

Thank you to my friends who tested for bugs and errors. Future updates will be incredibly minor fixes, if there are any updates at all. If there are still fixes to be made, let me know.
